sentences.en: A picture of a cat on a log is a rebus for catalog.
sentences.cn: 谜画中有一只猫(cat) 站在一块木头(alog)上,谜底是catalog( 目录).

sentences.en: It can be likened to a rebus, which uses pictures and single letters, or numbers to represent whole words (e.g, "i <3 u" means “I love you”, b4 means before, lol means laugh out loud, etc. ).
sentences.cn: 这种短信文是由图片、字母或数字的组合来代表某个单词的，感觉像字谜一样。 比如："i <3 u"就代表“我爱你”（中间的<3像是一颗心的形状，代表“爱”），b4就是before（以前）这个单词的缩写形式，而lol则是laugh out loud（大声笑出来）这三个单词的缩写。

sentences.en: Most people know a sort of puzzle called rebus.
sentences.cn: 大多数人都知道有一种称为画谜的猜谜.

words.tran_cn: 画谜；（以画为提示的）字谜

trans.tran_cn: （以画代词语，尤其是名字的）画谜，组字画
trans.tran_en: a puzzle consisting of pictures representing syllables and words; in such a puzzle the word hear might be represented by H followed by a picture of an ear
